text: nabivarugen kopamaṇa denek, ovun saman̆ga allāhgē dæhæmi danangen yut bohō denek samaga ekva (allāhgē mārgayē) saṭan karati. enamudu ovunaṭa allāhgē mārgayē sidu vū duṣkaratā venuven ovuhu adhairya novūha. tavada ovuhu durvala da novūha. emenma (saturanṭa) yaṭahat da novūha. tavada allāh ivasilivantayin va priya karayi
